title: CHARLY JORDAN ON TAYLER HOLDER BREAKUP AND SOMMER RAY â€” BFFs EP. 34 w/ Kio Cyr
description:
Charly Jordan joins us from Miami to talk about the recent drama with her, Tayler Holder, and Sommer Ray. She talks about her new brands, her new residency at a club in Vegas, and her transition into becoming a DJ. Kio Cyr joins us for the first portion to talk pre-fight about this week's headlines. We finish with some reactions from the entire fight night.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/bffspod
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
